All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddBody
A simple gRPC callout server that demonstrates HTTP body manipulation.
AddBody.Builder
 
AddHeader
A gRPC-based service callout example that demonstrates HTTP header manipulation.
AddHeader.Builder
 
BasicCalloutServer
Example callout server for processing HTTP headers and bodies.
BasicCalloutServer.Builder
 
JwtAuth
Handles JWT authentication by extracting and validating JWT tokens from HTTP headers.
JwtAuth.Builder
Builder specific to JwtAuth.
Redirect
Example callout server that performs an HTTP 301 redirect.
Redirect.Builder
 
ServiceCallout
ServiceCallout provides a base class for handling HTTP request and response processing in a gRPC-based service callout server.
ServiceCallout.Builder<T extends ServiceCallout.Builder<T>>
 
ServiceCalloutTools
ServiceCalloutTools provides utility methods for handling HTTP header and body mutations in Envoy service callouts.
SslUtils
SslUtils provides utility methods for handling SSL contexts and reading SSL certificate and key files.
